overview.community_driven_intro: Suma developed our privacy policy for and with community members. Our work started with students at the Ida B.Wells Just Data Lab where we explored best and worst privacy policy practices. From there, we wanted to hear what community had to say about our findings and engaged in conversations with community members across Portland. Their ideas, opinions, and thoughts have been incorporated in our policy at every level.
overview.consent_statement: Suma will asks for consent from our users and gives the option for users to change their mind
overview.education_statement: Suma seeks keep our users in the know and explain how and why we need or use your data
overview.intro: At suma, we believe you have the right to understand how your data is being used.
overview.jump_to_privacy_policy: Click to jump to sumas privacy policy
overview.title: Overview
overview.transparency_statement: Suma collects minimal personal data from users with no hidden tricks in the fine print
overview.trust_statement: Suma seeks to build trust with who we serve and overcome the privacy concerns preventing community from using tech

list.email: we will let you know about the change by email and/or by posting a notice on the suma platform’s homepage ($t(privacy-policy-strings:links:suma_platform_homepage)); and
list.opt_out: you will have the chance to opt out before information about you becomes subject to a different privacy policy

business_transfer.paragraph: We may choose to sell assets of the suma platform or buy assets for the platform. These transactions may be necessary and in our legitimate interests, particularly our interest in growing the platform to serve more community members and to offer more goods and services. User information is typically an asset that is transferred in these transactions (such as a sale, merger, liquidation, receivership, or transfer of all or substantially all of the suma platform’s assets). If we intend to transfer information about you:
business_transfer.title: Business transfers

children_under_13.paragraph: The suma platform is not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are under 13, please do not provide any information on the suma platform.
children_under_13.title: Children under 13

list.platform_communications: you cannot opt out of in-platform communications.
list.service_messages: you cannot opt out of receiving service messages from us, including privacy policy updates, security notices and legal notices.
list.valid_communication_methods: you are required to keep a valid phone number or email address on file to receive messages.

communications.paragraph: Sometimes we will need to communicate with you about the platform, including to let you know about things like new vendors, new community partners, savings or subsidy opportunities, community events and service messages. We will use the communication preferences and contact information you have shared with us to communicate with you via email, text and/or in-platform tools (i.e. messages we place in your inbox on the suma platform). Communications will take place in the language you indicate in your communication preferences. You may change your communication preferences and contact information at any time, except:
communications.title: Communications

contact_information.paragraph: If you have questions about this privacy policy, we are here to listen. Please contact suma at $t(privacy-policy-strings:links:suma_help_email). We are also available to host remote or in person meetings to provide information and answer questions about the privacy policy.
contact_information.title: Contact information

cookies_policy.conclusion: The suma platform only uses essential cookies known as “Session Cookies,” which allow the suma platform to know who you are signed in as. These essential session cookies are required for the platform to work properly. Session Cookies expire periodically as well as when you log out of the suma platform. The suma platform does not use persistent, optional or non-essential cookies.
cookies_policy.paragraph: We use cookies to help us manage the platform. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit the suma platform. A cookie contains a unique code, which we use to recognize your device when you return to the suma platform.
cookies_policy.title: Cookies policy

future_changes_to_policy.conclusion: You can always find the most recent version of the suma platform privacy policy at $t(privacy-policy-strings:links:suma_privacy_policy). Please contact $t(privacy-policy-strings:links:suma_help_email) for any questions or concerns regarding our policy changes.
future_changes_to_policy.paragraph: We may change the suma platform privacy policy from time to time. If we do change the suma platform privacy policy, we will let you know about the change by email and/or by posting a notice on the suma platform’s homepage $t(privacy-policy-strings:links:suma_platform_homepage). This notice will let you know what is changing and why it is changing. We will provide this notice at least 30 days before the changes take effect unless the law requires a different notice period. You will have the chance to consent to the changes at your first login to the platform after the changes take effect. If you do not consent to the changes, you will not be able to use the platform.
future_changes_to_policy.title: Future changes to policy

list.registration: **Registration:** We collect your name, telephone number, email, billing information, bank account and/or debit card details, and community partner name when you create your suma platform account.
list.subsidy: **Subsidy:** We collect personal information necessary to secure this outside funding. For example, if the subsidy provider will offer suma funding for users based on an income limit, we may collect financial information from you to confirm you are eligible for the subsidy.
list.vendors: **Vendors:** We collect information about what goods and services you access and purchase via the suma platform.

information_collected.paragraph: We collect the minimum information needed to create your suma platform account at registration, work with community partners, connect you with vendors, and secure outside funding from public and private organizations that reduces the cost of goods and services from vendors via the suma platform (what we refer to as “subsidy”):
information_collected.title: What personal information do we collect?

information_retention_and_removal.paragraph: We have the following standards for retaining and deleting personal information that we process in the suma platform:
information_retention_and_removal.title: Information retention, requests and removal

list.community_partners: **Community Partners:** We collect information from community partners (such as Hacienda CDC, Proud Ground, Home Forward, others) to help us qualify you for vendor discounts on the suma platform as well as to secure outside funding that reduces the cost of goods and services on the suma platform.
list.cookies: **Cookies and Log Files:** We use cookies so we know when you are logged in and we use log files to understand your activity on the platform. Please see our cookies policy to learn about the cookies we use and why.
list.registration_page: **Registration:** We use our registration page to collect information when you create your suma account.

methods_of_collection.paragraph: Your trust in, consent to and understanding of our privacy policy are fundamental to the suma platform. To provide platform services, we collect personal information from you in the following ways:
methods_of_collection.title: How do we collect your personal information?

methods_of_information_usage.paragraph: We use personal information to power suma platform services, to qualify you for platform vendor discounts, to support subsidy from outside organizations, to communicate with you, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with the law:
methods_of_information_usage.title: How do we use your personal information?

list.personal_information: For details on how we share certain personal information with platform vendors or subsidy providers, and how we may share certain personal information to comply with the law or resolve disputes, refer to
list.service_providers: **Service providers:** These are providers who help us operate the suma platform, and include payment
list.with_your_consent: **With your consent:** We may share your personal information to additional third parties if we notify you and you consent to the sharing

third_party_access.paragraph: Suma does not share personal information about you with any third parties for their own marketing purposes. We do share this information with trusted and vetted third parties (platform vendors, subsidy providers, service providers to the platform), to comply with the law or in the event of a dispute:
third_party_access.title: Third-party access

communicate_with_you.paragraph: We may use your information to respond to your communications, reach out to you about your transactions or account, market the platform, provide other relevant information, or request information or feedback. For more information about how we communicate with you,
communicate_with_you.title: Communicate with you

community_partners.paragraph: We may share certain data with affordable housing providers and other community community partners on how their residents are using the platform. For example, a community partner may request anonymized and aggregated transportation data to help them advocate for more e-bike stations in their neighborhood or may request anonymized and aggregated food data to help them advocate for a farmers market at their affordable housing complex. With your consent, we may share aggregate or anonymized data with these partners.
community_partners.title: Community partners

comply_with_law.paragraph: We may share your personal information if we believe it’s required by applicable law, regulation, operating license or agreement, legal process or governmental request, or where the disclosure is otherwise appropriate due to safety or similar concerns. For example, we may share your personal information if an e-scooter is lost or damaged in order to help the e-scooter vendor resolve how the vehicle was lost or damaged. We will provide notice to you if your personal information will be shared for this purpose when required by law.
comply_with_law.title: Comply with the law

list.deleting_certain_data: we may not be able to delete certain data because of legal, regulatory or subsidy reporting requirements, for purposes of safety, security, and fraud prevention, or because of an issue relating to your account such as an outstanding credit or an unresolved claim or dispute
list.deleting_your_account: deleting your account may not free up your email address or phone number for reuse on a new account

information_removal.paragraph: You may request deletion of your suma platform account and your associated personal information at any time from your Preferences page in the suma app. We will delete your account and personal information within 7 days after you make a deletion request. Please note:
information_removal.title: Information removal

list.information_driven_business_decisions: making information-driven business decisions about new platform features and offerings
list.maintain_performance: maintaining the performance of the suma platform
list.qualifications: providing you with the basic services of the suma platform, such as helping you find essential goods and services and qualifying you for platform vendor discounts

information_retention.paragraph: We will retain your personal information for legitimate and essential business purposes as long as your suma platform account is active. These purposes include:
information_retention.title: Information retention

security_and_fraud_prevention.paragraph: We may use your personal information to detect and prevent fraud. For example, fraudulent payments and fraudulent use of the suma platform.
security_and_fraud_prevention.title: Security and fraud prevention

services.paragraph: We use your registration information to set up your platform account so you can access goods and services on the platform and qualify for vendor discounts and/or subsidy.
services.title: Services

support_subsidy.paragraph: Funders from public and private organizations may want to put money into the suma platform to reduce the cost of food, transportation, utilities or other goods and services for platform users like yourself. You may opt-out through your Preferences page if you do not want your personal information used to secure such funding, but such funding may not be available to you if you opt-out.
support_subsidy.title: Support subsidy from outside organizations
